*div1 type="summary"* *p*D. W. Smith to Austin, September 12, 1826. Application for land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Matamoros */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-12-1826">12th- Sept 1826*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen Austin Esqr*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*I embrace the opportunity of *person_mentioned*Capt. Buckner*/person_mentioned*'s return to *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, to inform you that it is my wish to take up a *location_mentioned*League of land within your grant.*/location_mentioned* It is very gratifying to hear of the prosperity of this infant *location_mentioned*settlement*/location_mentioned*, It may indeed prove to be " *location_mentioned*the garden of America*/location_mentioned*." It is quite probable that I shall be a *person_mentioned*neighbor */person_mentioned*of yours, at no very distant period—but is impossible for me to leave my present situation immediately. I write in haste. We have however no political, or other, news of interest to communicate. *person_mentioned*Capt. B*/person_mentioned*. will give you the particulars of affairs in *location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*. You will do me the favor, sir, to attend to this business so soon as is convenient; and also "to write me on the subject. *person_mentioned*Capt. B*/person_mentioned*. will advise you in making choice of the land. Any business you may have with the *person_mentioned*Spanish govern- ment*/person_mentioned* in which I can serve you—shall do it at any time with much pleasure.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*D. W. Smith*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Look at next page*/p* *p*P. S.*/p*
*p*A friend of mine *person_mentioned*Capt. Barnes*/person_mentioned*, requests of you to do him the favor to reserve for him a *location_mentioned*League of land of good local situation*/location_mentioned* and quality.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*D. W. Smith*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
